actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of eligible survivors of certain individuals who were killed while participating in the Air Force Reserve Officers' Training Corps flight instruction program.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to certain individuals in full settlement of such individuals' claims against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of eligible survivors of certain individuals who were killed while participating in the Air Force Reserve Officers' Training Corps flight instruction program.
